name: Toro Cantina
description: A vibrant spot for modern Mexican fare with a focus on tacos and craft tequila cocktails, often hosting live music events.

name: Druthers Brewing Company
description: A regionally iconic brewpub offering house-brewed beers and elevated pub fare in a rustic, industrial space.

name: New World Bistro Bar
description: An innovative spot with a globally inspired menu, featuring unique fusions and locally sourced ingredients.

name: The Hollow Bar + Kitchen
description: A trendy spot combining great food with live music, known for burgers, craft beers, and a vibrant nightlife scene.

name: El Mariachi Mexican Restaurant
description: A colorful, family-run spot for classic Mexican dishes, especially known for tacos and margaritas.

name: Jack's Oyster House
description: A historic Albany institution since 1913, offering classic seafood and steak in an elegant setting.

name: Yono's Restaurant
description: A fine dining spot blending Indonesian flavors with contemporary cuisine, offering an upscale experience.

name: Lark Street Tavern
description: A neighborhood staple with hearty pub food, local beers, and occasional live music performances.

name: Albany Pump Station
description: A historic brewpub in a converted pump station, serving craft beer and elevated comfort food.

name: Mexican Radio
description: A lively Mexican spot with a focus on fresh, bold flavors and a great tequila selection, worth the drive from Albany.

name: Brown's Brewing Co.
description: A regional brewpub with house-made beers and hearty pub fare, located along the Hudson River.

name: Tara Kitchen
description: A unique spot offering authentic Moroccan cuisine with bold flavors, tagines, and a cozy setting.

name: Cornell's Restaurant
description: A historic Italian eatery near Albany, offering traditional fare in an elegant, old-world setting.

name: Madam Chef
description: A newer spot offering vibrant African and Caribbean flavors, with dishes like jollof rice and jerk chicken.
